website_summaries.verdict: Arm-length gloves will give you extra protection against chemicals versus hand gloves.
pros: With a 26-inch length, these gloves will keep your entire arm protected from chemical splashes and spills
Gloves have a nitrile coating that provides a textured grip and protects against abrasion
Interior is lined to make gloves more comfortable to wear
cons: Some of these gloves have an odd smell inside

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put on (given their length)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on (given their length), no horrible rubber smells. Size Large fit perfectly (for size Large gloves). No more messy wet arms from the fish tank! The only odd thing is that while the length states 26 inches, it seems more like a 23-24 inch length when worn. It may be 26" if stretched but in actual use it seems shorter, but still more than long enough unless you're going armpit deep. The nitrile material seems to want to stick to itself when fresh out of the package but no problems with that since. I haven't noticed any interior stink yet either but I don't keep them on for very long at a time.
customer_reviews.author: InterTube Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Gloves work good
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work good, but they smell funny like cranberry juice inside. I use them for my tall 10 gallon and they do the job. They dry fast and seem to store well so far. I read other reviews that they stink over time and judging from the way they smelled after the first time I used them, they will stink in the near future. But, this type of product has a limited availability, so if smell doesn't annoy you, the product works good and the gloves go up almost to my armpits. I am 5'5.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Ever get annoyed at always having wet hands or arms when you need to adjust one little thing in your fish tank? Then these are the gloves for you! Fingers are textured so you can easily grip things. Glove extends up to my shoulder (I'm 5'8 with long arms) Only bummer is that the material at the glove is quite thick so you lose some dexterity. Use them every week and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Got for washing dishes.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use at work im a dishwasher and I use some pretty dangerous chemicals and they were drying out my hands so I started using these and their amazing i love how long they are and how they have a band at the end so water can't get in and I can submerge my whole arm into the sink. Their also heat resistant so you can use really hot water if you need to. works really well and really well made.
customer_reviews.author: angelgirl19

customer_reviews.title: Love them for cleaning fish tanks
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. They make me feel like I'm in Breaking Bad! SCIENCE B*TCH!!! I don't know how they are with chemicals though sadly. I use them to keep my fish from biting me & or transferring anything on my hands into their water. The fish don't bite me a lot, but once in a while 1 of the larger ones will like to take a nibble. It doesn't hurt, but its always starting to have your hand under water & feel a slight pinch. Anyways, if you're making meth like Walter White I dunno how these would do..........but if you have curious cichlids that like to nibble.......these are great!
customer_reviews.author: JoshM5683

customer_reviews.title: Super short glove fingers
customer_reviews.text: The size - large, fits the palms but the glove fingers are super short - by about 3/4 of an inch. If your middle finger is longer than 3 inches you'll feel like you have webbed fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Big hands need large.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for with a large Chiclid that loves to eat arms in a 75 gallon aquarium. Now I can clean without getting bit. NOTE: for men always get large. Women maybe can get away with medium but they fit just right at large. Any smaller and they'd be too tight. Large are perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: TonyS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves whenever I have to maintain or do anything regarding my fish tanks. They keep of course hands all the way up (for me)-short person-to my armpits dry and protected from the water and protection for my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Softnbrace

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for pool work!
customer_reviews.text: I run a pool business and these are hands down the best gloves Ive ever used. They dont wear down from the chlorine or acid, they keep the water out, and for the most part they keep my hands warm during the winter while dealing with lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Cuuhhrriiss

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not big enough for a man with large-ish  hands. Arm length is not sufficient for deep ponds
customer_reviews.text: They are fine for the job, but they seems to be made out of that rubber that gets sticky and stuck to itself after a few years. You know what I mean? That material usually disintegrates too. Maybe not these, I hope, but they are not so expensive as to get angry if they do. These gloves fit my wife's hands fine, and the length is correct for her arms. The other pond gloves I bought somewhere 15 years ago or so are still in excellent condition and are sized better for me, but I could not find them anywhere, so I bought this pair for my wife to use
customer_reviews.author: BobL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to work in my 32 Gallon Bio Cube. They are long enough that I can reach all the way to the bottom and keep my arms dry and not expose my fish and coral to anything that might be on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ange M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves for Handy Work around the House!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to wear while we clean the fish tank. There is no leaking and fit great. They actually stay up on your arm and don't slip off. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I use these to clean aquariums because I was getting a contact rash from something in the water occasionally. The fit well, work great. Snug on arm so they don't fall down. Soft inside
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bankston

customer_reviews.title: very long, durable, cuff is tight.
customer_reviews.text: i find the cuff is too tight. enough to cut circulation off. but i guess its better then letting it slip off into the toilet. these go up to my shoulder. but i mostly bought it for my sand blaster. they will fit on a standard sewage connector (for a toilet), i attached mine with a gear clamp. the hard part is to sort of roll it on there and orient it so your hand is in the right position. the first one lasted me about 5 years i think, before the thing started to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoKing

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I actually bought another pair in a bigger size b3cause I was in the ocean oystering and you need to wear gloves on your hands but they are long, almost up to my armpit.
customer_reviews.author: Beachy

customer_reviews.title: 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Good material and 100% waterproof, work perfect to cleaning activities outdoor/indoor, very useful in winter, keep your hands dry but need additional protection if going use it in extreme cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Lebeau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these gloves to be this good. They are strong & feel like they'll last & last. The hand part has a little roughness to it that makes it easy to hold onto things. The cotton lining makes them very comfortable to wear. I HIGHLY recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for aquarium maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Almost goes all the way up to my shoulders. Durable rubber, and has tiny little bumps on the fingertips for grip. The soft inner lining is a nice little addition as well. I use it for aquarium maintenance, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia and Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Did it's job
customer_reviews.text: I got this for work because I couldn't wash dishes in the powersoak with bare hands due to my eczema. It did what it's supposed to. Although, if you wash dishes every single night at work like I do, and you don't clean the inside of your gloves properly, it will smell HORRID! But overall, worked like it should, no leaks, no major issues. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Pond Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves to clean out a Koi pond in the backyard. They have some insulating value, so when the water was about 40° this winter, these gloves allowed me to reach in and scoop leaves out of the pump without freezing my arm at all. They have a good fit for my hands and arms; they're even stretchy enough to go over a jacket sleeve. On me, the gloves reach up to about 4 inches above my elbow and they seem very comfortable and durable for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: briandb

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are very durable, which makes them a bit uncomfortable, but not too mucho. Overall I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Vasquez C

customer_reviews.title: very long gloves all the way up the arm... Would purchase again for work
customer_reviews.text: purchase these gloves for my son who was getting allergies from the chemicals that he uses to wash the dishes in the deli department of the grocery store where he works... Does a good job because the gloves go all the way up the arm hence keeping water from getting in... He said he could feel some water in hishand area but I don't see how that's possible... Would purchase these again they do the job
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool owners.
customer_reviews.text: We live in California, so don't have to winterize our pool. Still, when the water temp dips below 50 degrees (heck, even when it gets below 60), it's almost painful to dive my hands and arms into the water to test chemicals, clean out filters and pool sweeps, etc. These gloves keep me warm and dry. The cotton liners are soft and comfortable. And the nitrile coating is thick and durable, but still have a good grip and sense of touch. They are a bit pricey, but I'm glad I spent the money. Where else can you buy happiness for ~$12?
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe wearing these
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are exactly what I need. I've been searching for the perfect glove for use with chemicals at my job. The gloves my employer provides are so cheap and in the back of my mind I don't trust them. So I did a search on gloves on my own time and came across the Showa brand. I bought these on my own dime and it's worth it. The fit is impeccable, they hold up, and best of all I have peace of mind that my hands and arms are safe when dipping into chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Superb heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dishwashing gloves superb heat resistant even can be used with dishwashers
customer_reviews.author: Seanhanthorn

customer_reviews.title: For Messy, Heavy Duty Cleaning, It Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This gloves are just the trick for the mess up to your elbows type of cleaning. They are true to size, comfortable and wear well. I would strongly recommend some sort of disposable vinyl or latex glove be used also as a kind of liner. As your hands sweat, and if you are using any kind warm or hot water they will, the lining gloves will prevent moisture from soaking the inside lining of the main glove and the resulting odors that set in and are hard to remove. These gloves rock!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and non-irritating for Dyshidrotic Eczema Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty severe hand eczema and I'm also allergic to dust and many cleaners so I use these for everything from putting the dirty dishes in the dishwasher to cleaning the shower. I got them big so I could wear them over cotton gloves. They go all the way up my arm and keep my sensitive crybaby skin happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for pond work
customer_reviews.text: Imagine our pleasant surprise when these gloves arrived and the package referenced water gardening/working on ponds. That's what we had been looking for. They work great. I can fit a liner glove inside the large size, as I'd hoped, and still have good tactile sense. There's a grommet hole near the top that would allow a cord to tie the gloves together for storage, or for use, up behind your neck. I've not seen the need for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bloomquist

customer_reviews.title: perfect for performing weekly partial water changes on my aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I like there is no plastic aroma on these gloves. They seem to be well made and I expect them to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for aquarium life care
customer_reviews.text: Actually more armpit length than shoulder length, but that's certainly long enough. Also the reinforced hole near the top is great for hanging them up to dry.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieM

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about these long ago?
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them all the time around the pond and skimmer. Great gripping too. They fit nicely over a jacket so now you can stay warm in the cold weather and keep your hands warm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob VanHalder

customer_reviews.title: Not Total 26" but Still Good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well for large size. 4" palm width and around 25.5" arm length. It goes all the way up my arm passing my elbow. Nice inner limning fell soft and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tritan_King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning aquariums
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for doing my fish aquarium. Keeps my hands dry and clean. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cline

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The elastic is perfect for keeping them up. Good grip for wet dishes. Nice and durable
customer_reviews.author: Heather C. Valliere

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product... Only wish finger part was not as thick but all in all im loving this for when I have to go deep in my tanks
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to latex and these gloves are awesome I’m a dishwasher at a restaurant and are constantly getting my hands wet in this protect every inch of my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McNally

customer_reviews.title: Multi use gloves
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves her gloves, she uses them to clean the pool filters during winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth I Hofman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect aquarium gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Perfect for aquarium maintenance. We have a deep tank and my sleeves never get wet with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves for cleaning pool skimmer!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for the perfect gloves to clean our pool skimmer for years! Love these! Long enough to keep water from running into the gloves. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and fits my long arms.
customer_reviews.text: Long, and fits great. the inside is lined with cotton which feels great. There are holes hear the top to let out air as you push your hand into the water. One thing i will mention is the cotton which is so comfortable will start to stink if you get water in the glove and don't wash it. I flipped the glove inside out and rinsed it off them air dried them. Done and done.
customer_reviews.author: L F

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I used these gloves to pull poison ivy plants out of a neighbor’s back yard. I actually cut the fingers out and used a more pliable nitrile gloves over the hands. No poison ivy on the arms or on the hands, and threw the rest of the clothes away! Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a good three months before the gloves start to take in ...
customer_reviews.text: They didn't last long at work (dish washing at a restaurant), but they did get the job done. Lasted a good three months before the gloves start to take in water. Good pair for what it was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shade Koopa

customer_reviews.title: Pond
customer_reviews.text: My husband , loves them. He uses them to work in his pond
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zaniello

customer_reviews.title: great for the price was well spent
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing to dislike about them I wear them for about 3 hours straight and they are great for washing dishes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable, really long arm coverage
customer_reviews.text: Super durable, really long arm coverage, all the way up the arm. So far I can say it is worth it's money. Great product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elke

customer_reviews.title: Very good for industrial dish washing work
customer_reviews.text: Very good for industrial dish washing work. But you'll need to renew every three months if using everyday for 4 hours or more.
customer_reviews.author: Oum Shams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for chemical contact, very comfortable gloves
customer_reviews.text: We are wearing these gloves to work with chemicals and they fit perfect. The smell inside of them is not very nice but once you put your hands inside of them you don't feel it. Also the hands are covered with a material very cool is all made from nitrile but the fingers are like rough so you are able to grab whatever you need and won't fall.
customer_reviews.author: cirekcr

customer_reviews.title: These are nice gloves, but they don't last very long in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves, but they don't last very long in heavy duty use. (restaurant dish washing - pots and pans) After a few 8 hour shifts of work, the finger tips crack and they leak. For other uses they might be fine. They are nice gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Sarg

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be keeping whatever’s biTing me in the garden pots from getting in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At last!
customer_reviews.text: Have always wanted a pair of these to use when I empty the pool baskets in the winter. You still feel the cold but it's totally manageable. So happy I finally found these. With the length, no worries of water going in even when I have to reach deeper to re-attached the pool sweep. Highly recommend a pair if you are a pool owner.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Greenlow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend; durable too
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several pieces of this already. Highly recommend; durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Maricar Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pool-related purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Work exactly as designed. One of the best pool-related purchases I've ever made. Love them year round, but REALLY love them, in the winter. You know, when it's the middle of an ice storm and you have to go clean leaves out of the baskets? Yeah, these things are worth twice the price on those days.
customer_reviews.author: Monday Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Highly reconmmed to ANY one cleaning fish tanks
customer_reviews.text: Works great perfectly comfortable and long enough to protect your hands and arms from biting fish or infections on your skin from chemicals being used in the water tank heater freshwater or salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, easy to maneuver items in tank
customer_reviews.text: Use these gloves to clean 29 gal fish tank. So far, they have worked well. No leaks, comfortable, easy to maneuver items in tank. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: They run small but that’s OK fit me perfect and it they seem durable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size medium rubber glove whenever I buy Rubbermaid latex glove is fit perfect would not recommend for man’s hands
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Use in pool when water is cold
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning stuff out of pool when its cold
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Norton

customer_reviews.title: Rubber gloves
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution to my dilemna. I am a tropical fish keeper and have to add chemicals to my tap water to make it safe for the fish. During routine maintenance I need to put my hands into the treated water which caused some problems with the skin on my hands drying up to the point of cracking and bleeding. These gloves are long, lined, quality rubber which is keeping my hands safe in that water.
customer_reviews.author: stevesf

customer_reviews.title: Fingers run small.
customer_reviews.text: This glove is nice, does not have a strong smell like some others have wrote about. I ordered a large pair of gloves (as large sized gloves usually fit perfectly) but on this pair the fingers are very short. It still fits, but not too comfortable. I would say if you have large hands/fingers buy the XL size.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: With plans on using acid-based stain, I wanted something that would give me excellent coverage of not just my hands, but my arms as I work with various chemicals. These gloves cover all the way to mid-bicep (my height is 5'9") which is perfect. The hands seem 'just a bit' on the small side, as they do fit 'like a glove', which may be helpful when working with small items. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for dishwashers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my guys at the restaurant. They love them and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Keating Family

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for cleaning 20 gal hexagonal fish tank, they work great ,keep my arms dry while cleaning the rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Marilysk

customer_reviews.title: Work awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had an odd project to complete that needed long gloves to work. These fit me great, had a nice smooth inside. Some grip on the outside, but not too rough. Held up well against lysol and alcohol cleaning. I had to put a couple holes in them and they did not tear excessively where I made the holes. I get the impression these will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: F. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves for Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves when cleaning my saltwater tank, they are not bulky like other gloves I've purchased. If water does get inside from the top of the glove (if you don't pull it all the way up your arm) it will smell as any glove would. I turn them inside out to dry. They do the job and keep my arms dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cavatina

customer_reviews.title: I love these gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The best. The cotton liner allows for longer amounts of work time in the gloves, and easy hand removal. After going through 2 or 3 pairs of other brands i landed on these and will always buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Fingers to short!
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves,but the fingers are to short. If they were about another half inch longer they would be great! The thumb is really short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She does swimming pool maintenance and in the winter it is very cold to put your hands in and out of water. These keep her hands and forearms dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Tedy D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, effective in keeping epoxy off of my hands and arms. surface of glove's hand does not attract epoxy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: This is product has a lot of different uses. Not just welding, I’ve been using it on the job for damn near everything. It took such notice my co-worker even wanted one!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves, watch out for sizing
customer_reviews.text: These gloves turned out to be perfect for my husband to wear while working in the pool. Water can't get inside. I bought him size large, thinking he could wear warm gloves underneath, but the large size fitted his sm/med hands snugly. I would buy more in a minute, but would go up a size. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: slewfoot

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Gloves ripped on me on the first use. Not so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Glove
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for two reasons: to clean a 175-gallon salt water tank and to clean an above the ground pool. These gloves work great!They fit well and keep your hands and arms dry and warm. I looked at pet (fish) stores and pool stores for these gloves, but found the least expensive ones on Amazon. I highly recommend these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Kay G

customer_reviews.title: They protect you for water and chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work with chemical, my friends just started buying.
customer_reviews.author: mariazapien

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: We use these when working in our outdoor ponds. Husband and I fight over them. Extremely durable and well made; hold up to machine washing. (Don't put in dryer though.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice length on arm
customer_reviews.text: Used to help with cleaning a fish pond, nice length on arm, does the job
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH RENZULLI

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome I will be buying another pair for my other fish tank
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: no poison ivy on my skin this year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to pull up poison ivy. I always seem to get poison ivy on my forearms, no matter how careful I am when trying to get it out of our yard with regular gloves. This took care of that problem. Whew.
customer_reviews.author: up late

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length gloves for the job
customer_reviews.text: use this for oysters. Perfect length gloves for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gloves for cleaning pond
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended strongly that I get "some protection" when cleaning filters in my backyard pond where I have 17 goldfish. It seems there are some nasty little bugs that could potentially cause infections that are difficult to treat. This my not be true for you, but I take medications which increase my exposure. This never entered my mind. It was important to get gloves that were shoulder length and I could not find them locally. I bought two pair for me and my wife. They were just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really love these gloves. Bought them to do maintenance on my saltwater aquarium and I couldnt be happier. Much better than the crappy ones at the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: Great set of gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of gloves. Every season I wash down some decks with a bleach solution before painting. I always had trouble finding something to protect my hands. Most things leaked through after awhile. Not these. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: oceans

customer_reviews.title: These are great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves ! I used to freeze my hands when I worked on my pool in the winter but with these gloves my hands stay warm and dry. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA LOFTUS

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a glove that is long enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair to reach down in the cold water of an outdoor pond to change the underwater filter. These gloves extend the entire length of my arm and even over my shoulder a bit. I would highly recommend these for aquarium owners.
customer_reviews.author: R2Art

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fantasic for cleaning my fish tank...i can almost reach the bottom of my 90 gallon aquarium. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Working in cold water aquarium and love these - warm, dry, seem pretty durable. I got XL and they are nice and large - comfortable on hands that are often too big for gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Yours Truly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gloves
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these gloves is that your hands stay dry from sweat. There are breathing holes at the top of the arm which, combined with the fabric interior, allow your hands to stay dry even in very warm water for extended times. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great for gardening
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Protects me from all my plants with thorns. I take blood thinner and I have to b very careful and not get cuts or scratches. They serve my need 100%!
customer_reviews.author: David Rice

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work well. I don't know if I've actually "used" them, but I have worn them as a precaution. It's nice that they go pretty far up my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This glove fits over my daughters cast. Helps keep her arm dry when showering. I received the gloves quickly. They are very strong and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my fish from biting me when I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my fish from biting me when I have to put my hands in the tank and they are sexy too....
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a hand problem in the yard....!
customer_reviews.text: You can do away with all the problems on your hands with these gloves. They are the real protectors, dont be too lazy to put them on, you will be marvelously satisfied. Thank you Atlas.
customer_reviews.author: Karel C. Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves! I no longer get my hands and arms grungy when cleaning out my pond or working on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Woods

customer_reviews.title: good work glove for washing dishes
customer_reviews.text: use this for work at cafeteria kitchen washing dishes...keeps hands dry and clean with no leaks or wetness..great for this job
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Long and strong
customer_reviews.text: Good and strong. Used them for heavy stripping and happy I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Shawn P. Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This pair of gloves are very heavy duty, they go all the way up my arm and is perfect for cleaning my 55 gallon fish tank.
customer_reviews.author: et5252

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Gloves arrived promptly and were exactly as described. Will purchase more in the future. Particularly like the way they fit and the elastic at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: no more water in gloves........
customer_reviews.text: JUST LOVE the Atlas Gloves, I use it for my fountains and pond to clean filters, no more water in gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great dye gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is what we use in our school studio for dyeing. We work around toxic dye powders and chemicals as well as large hot pots of chemicals on the stove, and these will protect you the best. If you dye on a regular basis these are a must to protect yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in protecting your arms from jumping dogs with an older person with thin skin
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for cleaning fish tanks
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect for cleaning fish tanks! They go all the way up your arm and prevent water from running down to your hands like regular dish washing gloves do. They also fit snug around the upper part of your arm so they won't slide down. Great product! A+
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves for clearing out very cold sump pump hole
customer_reviews.text: Used these gloves in frigid NH sump pump hole. Needed to clean out debris and get it a little deeper. Gloves kept my arms and hands from freezing in this cold water.
customer_reviews.author: No

product_meta.title: Atlas Glove WG772L 26-Inch Long Sleeve Nitrile Coated Cotton Lined Work Gloves, Large
product_meta.description:
Size:LargeTough nitrile coated glove protects hands and arms up to the shoulder. Great for liquid and chemical protection. Puncture resistant durable textured grip. Fully lined. 26 inch length.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
ATLAS Gloves are in demand because they are more comfortable, more flexible, and better made than competing brands. SHOWA Glove Co., innovative designer and manufacturer of ATLAS Gloves, has been a leader in glove technology and development for more than 50 years. Experience shows in the quality and diversity of styles the company makes.
feature_bullets: Tough nitrile coated glove protects hands and arms up to the shoulder
Great for liquid and chemical protection
Tough Nitrile coated gloves protect hands and arms from chemicals, puncture and abrasion
Excellent for: cleanup, commercial fishing, chemical handling, food processing, pond cleaning, and handling greasy and oily equipment.
